Hi,

I am going thru the codebase of this great project ,

can some one point me in the right direction, I am working for a very 
early start up company and we need to crawl some web sites for proof 
of concept.


1) need to extract title , keywords , and content and put them in 
database for each of the website in a domain.

Can some one point me in the right direction to which classes to look 
for and where heritrix looks for parsing them.

any pointers are welcome

thanks in advance

sivaji
